short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide youtube controls when you are on a youtube page with a video or a short

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide/show the controls of a video on youtube or the overlay of a short. (Usefull if you pause the video and the control is above the very thing you wanted to see. Such as subtitles. or if the overlay of a short is above some key element of the video)
